item.name: Kannel: number of running processes bearerbox
Kannel: number of running processes smsbox

trigger_prototype.name: Kannel: {#SMSC} is not in online state
trigger_prototype.description: If last state of SMSC provider is not "online" for 5 minutes - alert.

trigger.expression: {Kannel Template:web.test.rspcode[Kannel: status page check,XML page check].last()}<>200
trigger.name: Bad response code for kannel status page
Kannel is not running on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Kannel status check, if it is not "running" - alert.

dependency.name: Bad response code for kannel status page
dependency.expression: {Kannel Template:web.test.rspcode[Kannel: status page check,XML page check].last()}<>200

trigger.expression: {Kannel Template:web.test.time[Kannel: status page check,XML page check,resp].avg(5m)}>5s
trigger.name: Long response from kannel status page
